To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::Dark One/Pyro/Punch/Nemesis Enforcer::

Punch yells as he is pushed, spinning around and seeing Megaprime. "Defences, 
recognize Megaprime as enemy. Slagg him!"

The defences turn to also fire at Megaprime, along with Punch.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis Enforcer walks into the scene, seeing all the gunfire. "All blast 
doors close," he says, blast doors closing down the corridors.

"No one escapes!" he yells, firing at Megaprime.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pyro comes near a door. "Hey, Dark One," he hisses, Dark One slamming away 
the gun that Megaprime had tossed at Iron Raptor with his own gun, then 
looking at Pyro.

"Is that the chamber?" he asks, looking at the door as he edges closer. Pyro 
nods, the two bots hurrying into the room, the door closing behind them.

"Blast doors close," Dark One says, the blast doors closing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis and Punch fire at Tigerhawk and Megaprime along with the interior 
defences.
